duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspire and lead a team, sharing subject-matter expertise while fostering creativity in an incentive-based work environment.
Collaborate with peers to build high-performing teams through best practice sharing and coaching sales reps to reach their personal and professional goals.
Build positive customer relationships, utilize probing techniques to overcome obstacles, and ensure store success by exceeding operational metrics in a retail setting.
Lift up to 35 lbs, stand for prolonged periods, and travel to support store hours as business needs dictate.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience
